### Government Tender Announcement
#### Notice Reference: PW-ISM-027-28782
#### Publication Date: August 19, 2022
#### Closing Date: November 25, 2022, 5:00 PM EST


### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the renewal of a Government-Owned Contractor-Operated (GOCO) contract for the Naval Engineering Test Establishment (NETE) 3. The contract scope includes the provision of independent verification and validation (IV&V) services, as well as test and evaluation services to the Royal Canadian Navy (RCN) and other DND organizations.


NETE is the prime test and evaluation centre for naval equipment, providing expertise in areas such as system integrity, engineering safety, and operational effectiveness. This contract will allow DND to ensure the continued safe and effective operation of naval equipment.


### Requirements and Deliverables
Successful proposals must demonstrate a comprehensive understanding of the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document. Deliverables will include, but are not limited to:


*   Provision of IV&V services for naval equipment
*   Test and evaluation services to the RCN and other DND organizations
*   Site visits and on-site testing as required
*   Delivery of test and evaluation reports to DND

### Evaluation and Award Criteria
Proposal evaluation will be based on the following criteria:


*   Technical merit (40%)
*   Price (30%)
*   Past performance (15%)
